title: Simply making jewellery
creator_credit: International Film Foundation, Sam Bryan and Ting Barrow
brief_description: Patricia Meyerowitz of New York City shows how she creates unique items of jewellery using inexpensive objects found in hardware stores, art and garment supply stores and elsewhere.
